responses: 📅 Arrive at least two weeks before classes for timely Student’s Pass processing with ICA. You’ll receive an email from stpformalitiessingapore@jcu.edu.au with your Student Pass Collection appointment details. ⏳ Be punctual to avoid delays.
🩺 If you've already had a medical check-up in your home country, you don't need another one in Singapore.
📌 16 Jan 2025, 09:00 AM – 09:05 AM, Block C 🎤 Welcome speech by the Deputy Vice-Chancellor. 👔 Smart casual attire required (no shorts/slippers).

📅 16 January 2025, 09:10 AM - 10:25 AM, at Block C - Learn about JCU’s virtual learning environment and collaboration spaces. ✅ Bring a laptop (no tablets or mobile phones), and 🍽 lunch will be provided.
🕰 16 Jan 2025, 10:40 AM - 11:40 AM, in breakout rooms - Consult with your course’s academic advisors for guidance.
📅 16 Jan 2025, 01:30 PM - 03:00 PM, Block E.💡Connect with JCU staff and discover academic, career, and well-being resources.

⌚ 16 Jan 2025, 03:00 PM - 05:00 PM, Multi-Purpose Hall
- Connect with lecturers and peers for academic and career tips, ☕🍰 afternoon tea included.
📍14 Jan 2025, 02:00 PM - 05:30 PM, JCU The Shoppes Marina Bay Sands - Discover the campus, 🎉 enjoy activities, and connect with new students. 📌 Register by 3rd Jan 2025.
🔎 I didn’t quite catch that. You can refer to the [Orientation Guide](https://www.jcu.edu.sg/courses-and-study/orientation/during-orientation) or ask a staff member for assistance.
